title: Sajid Javid – 2022 Comments on Appointment of Richard Meddings as Chair of NHS England
author: admin
summary: The comments made by Sajid Javid, the Secretary of State for Health and Social Care, on 22 January 2022.
content:
I am delighted to confirm Richard Meddings CBE’s appointment as the new Chair of NHS England, I want to thank Lord Prior for his invaluable contribution over the last few years.
